item.title: ifplugd 实现网口检测
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: ifplugd检测eth0拔插消息 为了检测固定网线口的拔插消息，在busybox里配置了ifplugd ptions: -n Don't daemonize -s Don't log to syslog -i IFACE Interface -f/-F Treat link detection error as link
